trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class for a strongly typed non-generic read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: Gir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> basisklasse for en forespørselsparameter av sterk type ikke generisk skrivebeskyttet samling.

trans-unit.source: A ReadOnlyCollectionBase instance is always read-only.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av ReadOnlyCollectionBase er alltid skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> for a modifiable version of this class.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>etter en kan endres versjon av denne klassen.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, er en O(1)-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for denne egenskapen er en O(1)-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en opplisting som går gjennom den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: Den `foreach` -setningen for språket C# (`for each` i Visual Basic) skjuler av hvor komplekse enumeratorene.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av derfor `foreach` anbefales, i stedet for direkte manipulering enumeratoren.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratorene kan brukes til å lese data i samlingen, men de kan ikke brukes til å endre den underliggende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: I utgangspunktet er enumeratoren plassert før det første elementet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>henter også enumeratoren tilbake til denne plasseringen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: På denne plasseringen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>er udefinert.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må derfor kalle <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>å flytte enumeratoren til det første elementet i samlingen før leser <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>Returnerer det samme objektet før enten <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>eller <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>kalles.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>angir <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>til neste element.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>formidler slutten av samlingen enumeratoren er plassert etter det siste elementet i samlingen og <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Når enumeratoren er på denne plasseringen, etterfølgende kall til <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>også returnere `false`.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis siste kall til <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>returnerte `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>er udefinert.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>til det første elementet i samlingen på nytt, kan du kalle <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>etterfulgt av <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: En opplisting forblir gyldig så lenge samlingen forblir uendret.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer til samlingen, for eksempel å legge til, endre eller slette elementer, enumeratoren ugyldiggjøres, og virkemåten er ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumeratoren har ikke eksklusiv tilgang til samlingen. lister opp i en samling er derfor gjelder ikke en sikker-prosedyre.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: For å garantere tråd sikkerhetsnivået under opplisting, kan du låse samlingen under hele opplistingen.

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Du må implementere din egen synkronisering for å tillate samlingen for å få tilgang til flere tråder for lesing og skriving.

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en O(1)-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>for den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over elementer i den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: Henting av verdien for denne egenskapen er en O(1)-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> representing the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance itself.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som representerer den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> serverforekomsten seg selv.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Overfører hele <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> til en kompatibel endimensjonal <xref:System.Array>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen på Målmatrisen.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte matrisen må være kompatibelt.

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to copy the elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker <xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til elementer.</xref:System.Array.Copy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en O (`n`) operasjonen, der `n` er <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den endimensjonal <xref:System.Array>som er målet for elementene kopieres fra <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Array>må ha nullbasert indeksering.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen i `array` som kopiering begynner.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayer flerdimensjonal.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - eller - antallet elementer i kilden er større enn den tilgjengelige plassen fra index til slutten av målet array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Hva slags kilden kan ikke endres automatisk til av målet array .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to a <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilgang til en <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> objektet synkroniseres (tråden trygt).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> object is not synchronized.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>objektet er ikke synkronisert.</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> class using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan gi en synkroniserte versjon av den <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>klasse ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Lister opp i en samling vil si gjelder ikke sikker.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Selv når en samling synkroniseres, kan andre tråder fortsatt endre samlingen, som fører til at enumeratoren til Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: For å garantere tråd sikkerhetsnivået under opplisting, kan du låse samlingen under hele opplistingen eller opp unntak som er et resultat av endringer foretatt av andre tråder.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgang til den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> objektet synkroniseres (tråden trygt); ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to a <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til en <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> class using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser kan gi sin egen synkroniserte versjon av den <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>klasse ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> object, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: Synkronisering koden må utføre operasjoner på den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>for den <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>-objektet ikke direkte på den <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Dette sikrer ordentlig med samlinger som er avledet fra andre objekter.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt den opprettholder riktig synkronisering med andre tråder som kan være samtidig endring av <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Lister opp i en samling vil si gjelder ikke sikker.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Selv når en samling synkroniseres, kan andre tråder fortsatt endre samlingen, som fører til at enumeratoren til Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: For å garantere tråd sikkerhetsnivået under opplisting, kan du låse samlingen under hele opplistingen eller opp unntak som er et resultat av endringer foretatt av andre tråder.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til den <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"> </xref> objektet.
